snippet: Gov. Sean Parnell will urge in his fiscal 2015 budget plan that the state tap $3 billion in one of its savings accounts to pay down $11.9 billion unfunded liability in Alaska’s two largest pension funds.
abstract: Alaska's Gov Sean Parnell will urge in his 2015 budget plan that state tap $3 billion in one of its savings accounts to pay down $11.9 billion unfunded liability in its two largest pension funds.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Sean Parnell will urge in his fiscal 2015 budget plan that the state tap $3 billion in one of its savings accounts to pay down $11.9 billion unfunded liability in Alaska’s two largest pension funds.

headline.main: Alaska: Pension Plan Would Tap State Savings
headline.print_headline: Alaska: Pension Plan Would Tap State Savings
